rows.label: qst300103_msg101
rows.name:
So you're making rations? If
there's anything I can do to
help, I'll let Zuo know.

rows.label: qst300103_msg103
rows.name:
You got the Mokmo Onions! You
should go to the cooking area
and make the Dried Scented Char.

rows.label: qst300103_msg104
rows.name:
[ML:Dash ]That's quite a strong scent.
They say it's a sign of
nutrition, but this is intense.

rows.label: qst300103_msg001
rows.name:
Hey, you. I hear you're
collecting various ingredients.

rows.label: qst300103_msg002
rows.name:
Then you should try looking for
something called a Mokmo Onion!

rows.label: qst300103_msg003
rows.name:
Sorry for the suddenness. It's a very
nutritious, high-class ingredient, so I
thought it would be perfect for rations.

rows.label: qst300103_msg004
rows.name:
It's on Lasqam Island in Gula, but
you have to dig very deep to get it,
so it rarely appears on the market.

rows.label: qst300103_msg005
rows.name:
I think you can get to the place where it
grows without getting lost, but whether
you can find it depends on your skill.

rows.label: qst300103_msg006
rows.name:
With a Mokmo Onion, Breath
Charcoal, and a Steel Char, you
can make Dried Scented Char.

rows.label: qst300103_msg007
rows.name:
I'll give you the Breath Charcoal
and Steel Char, so please do your
best to find the Mokmo Onion.

rows.label: qst300103_msg008
rows.name: Do your best to find it.
